source_sentence: (又有給孤長者請畫寺因緣一卷出雜事第十七及毘奈耶頌第五卷從摩竭魚因緣經下四十二部四十九卷並是說一切有部律中緣起三藏義淨鈔出流行既是別生故編斯錄)。
translation: (There is also a request to Gokul Gṛdhrakūṭa for a painting of the temple, one volume out of the seventeenth volume of the miscellaneous works and the fifth volume of the Vinaya verse, forty-two sections and forty-nine volumes under the Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of the Maghāvatāra, and this is the Record of the Saṃkhya School of Vinaya, which is a summary of the dependent arising tripiṭaka meanings and popularizations that have been separately produced.)

translation: One hundred and thirty-four parts and one hundred and thirty-four volumes of the Shisheng ji she sheng biangsheng lümishou jing one volume (a lacun yu a lacangshou) one volume of the sandalwood coated stūpa jing the upper right two sūtras out of the compilation of the one hundred conditions sūtras.

source_sentence: 並度人儀五紙　新編上叔離比丘尼本緣經一卷陳錄云抄賢愚經　出第七卷　新編上沙彌守戒自殺經一卷(出第七卷)二鸚鵡聞四諦經一卷(出第十二卷)鳥聞比丘法生天經一卷(出第十二卷)五百鴈聞佛法生天經一卷(出第十三卷)堅誓師子經一卷(出第十三卷)優波斯那經下九部九卷並出賢愚經。
translation: It also contains five pages of the new series of the Sutra of the Original Conditions of the Nuns, one volume of the Shuli bhikṣu, one volume of the Transcription of the Sutra of Good and Foolishness, and the seventh volume of the new series of the Sutra of Śrāmaṇerī's Observance of the Precepts and Suicide, one volume (out of the seventh volume), one volume of the Sutra of the Four Truths Heard by Two Parrots (out of the twelfth volume), one volume of the Sutra of the Birth in Heaven Heard by a Bhikṣu (out of the twelfth volume), one volume of the Sutra of the Birth in Heaven Heard by Five Hundred Animals Heard by the Buddha (out of the thirteenth volume), one volume of the Sutra of the Teacher of Firm Vows (out of the thirteenth volume), and nine volumes of the nine divisions of the Upāsaka Sutra.

source_sentence: 修行勸意經一卷(祐錄云抄中阿含出第二卷)忍辱經一卷(陳錄云抄修行道地出第三卷)曉食經一卷(抄曉了食品出第三卷)地獄罪人眾苦經一卷(或云眾苦事出第三卷)地獄眾生相害經一卷(出第三卷)歡悅品經一卷(或云歡悅出第四卷)人病醫不能治經一卷(或云不能自治人受身入陰經下一十三經並出修行道地經)阿練若習禪法經一卷(即是抄菩薩禪法第一卷其菩薩禪法即坐禪三昧經是)新編上禪經偈一卷(祐云抄禪經中偈即是禪法要解抄)　新編上形疾三品風經一卷(祐云抄思惟略要法)諸法實相觀經一卷(亦抄思惟略要法)新編上阿恕伽王本緣經一卷(出阿育王傳第二卷)新編上蓮華女經一卷(是法句喻經別抄出第二卷)初受道經一卷賣智慧經一卷福子經一卷國王癡夫人經一卷八歲沙彌開解國王經一卷化譬經一卷(一名化喻經)獼猴與婢共戲致變經一卷居士沒故為婦鼻中蟲經一卷度脫狗子經一卷(或無脫子)俱夷懷羅云本經一卷須河譬喻經一卷或無譬字。
translation: 修行勸意經一卷(祐錄云抄中阿含出第二卷)忍辱經一卷(陳錄云抄修行道地出第三卷)曉食經一卷(抄曉了食品出第三卷)地獄罪人眾苦經一卷(或云眾苦事出第三卷)地獄眾生相害經一卷(出第三卷)歡悅品經一卷(或云歡悅出第四卷)人病醫不能治經一卷(或云不能自治人受身入陰經下一十三經並出修行道地經)阿練若習禪法經一卷(即是抄菩薩禪法第一卷其菩薩禪法即坐禪三昧經是)新編上禪經偈一卷(祐云抄禪經中偈即是禪法要解抄)　新編上形疾三品風經一卷(祐云抄思惟略要法)諸法實相觀經一卷(亦抄思惟略要法)新編上阿恕伽王本緣經一卷(出阿育王傳第二卷)新編上蓮華女經一卷(是法句喻經別抄出第二卷)初受道經一卷賣智慧經一卷福子經一卷國王癡夫人經一卷八歲沙彌開解國王經一卷化譬經一卷(一名化喻經)獼猴與婢共戲致變經一卷居士沒故為婦鼻中蟲經一卷度脫狗子經一卷(或無脫子)俱夷懷羅云本經一卷須河譬喻經一卷或無譬字。

source_sentence: 陳錄云抄雜阿含第十流離王入地獄經一卷(出曜中亦有未詳所以)福報經一卷(法經錄中重上)教子經一卷(祐云一名須達教子經舊錄云須達訓子經)迦葉詰阿難經一卷亦名迦葉責阿難雙度羅漢喻經。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of King Liuli's Descent into Hell (also found in the Exorcist's Record), one volume of the Sutra on the Rewards of Good Fortune (reprinted above in the Fajing Record), one volume of the Sutra on Teaching Children (Yau-Yun's Record), one volume of the Sutra on Teaching Children (Old Record), and one volume of the Sutra of Kāśyapa's Refuge against Ānanda (also known as the Sutra of the Parable of Kāśyapa's Refuge against Ānanda's Double Deliverance to the Lohan.

source_sentence: 隋眾經錄存為二經者誤人詐名為道經一卷貧女人聽經為毒蛇所囓命終生天經一卷明宿願果報經一卷聽四因譬喻經一卷王后為蜣蜋經一卷金色女經一卷(安公云出阿毘曇)赤[口*(隹/乃)]烏喻經一卷神通應化經一卷(一名羅漢比丘答問)阿難多恒羅云母經一卷(一名羅云母經)種田經一卷覺福經一卷(或云學福經一卷)四飯聖法章一卷八部僧行名經一卷阿難邠祁四時布施經一卷初受道下二十九經並出雜譬喻經。
translation: The Sui Record of the Buddhist Canon contains two sūtras: the Sutra of Misconstruing the Names of Men and the Way, one volume, and the Sutra of the Poor Woman Who Listens to the Sutra and Is Sucked in by a Viper When Her Life Ends in Heaven, one volume, and the Sutra of the Fruits of Past Vows, one volume, and the Sutra of the Four Causes and Parables, one volume, and the Sutra of the Golden Maiden, one volume.

source_sentence: 准隋仁壽眾經錄中有三十九經。
translation: According to the Sui Renshou zongling lu, there are thirty-nine sūtras.

source_sentence: 今以罵意經一卷撿諸代錄云安世高譯。
translation: Now, I'll take the Sutra of Meaning, one volume, and I'll collect the records of the generations and say that An Shigao translated it.
It's missing from the present compilation and collection.
Six of the sutras on the Parable of the Human Being say "out of rebuke".
It's already been compiled above, so we'll remove it.

source_sentence: 其得道梯橙經亦云出雜譬喻。
translation: The Sutra on Attaining the Way, Ladder, and Orange also says that it's a collection of metaphors.

source_sentence: 今以大本即無且編入藏。
translation: Now, it's compiled into the canon based on the fact that the primary text is nonexistent.

source_sentence: 其無懼經鱉喻毒喻經誨子經馬喻經首達經已上六經並出生經之中。
translation: The Sutra of Fearlessness contains the turtle parable, the poison parable, the lion's share parable, the horse parable, the Śuddhodana parable, and the six sūtras listed above, as well as the birth scriptures.
The old saying that they were produced from miscellaneous metaphors was a mistake.
This is also removed from the present compilation of those sūtras.

source_sentence: 其迦葉責阿難雙度羅漢喻經即迦葉詰阿難經異名不合雙上除此十經之外有二十九經如前所列。
translation: The parable of Kāśyapa rebuking Ānanda and the parable of the two saints, which is synonymous with the scripture of Kāśyapa's rebuke of Ānanda, doesn't fit with the two scriptures.
It's said to be a collection of metaphors.
We don't know which one comes from which.

source_sentence: 其雙卷譬喻二本撿並無此等經。
translation: There are no such sūtras in the two collections of two-fascicle parables.
It should come from the eighty-fascicle edition.

source_sentence: 或可出護公所譯雜譬喻三百五十首經其經。
translation: Perhaps it's possible to produce one of the 350 sūtras of the Zākyamuni sūtra that was translated by Hōgō.
It's also in the Catalogue of Missing Books.

source_sentence: 貞元新定釋教目錄卷第二十六
translation: Zhenyan Revised List of Canonical Buddhist Texts, Volume 26
